document_data.name: Durpari-Shaartan Patois
document_data.mainbody: '''Durpari-Shaartan Patois''' was a creole of [[Durpari language|Durpari]] and [[Shaaran language|Shaaran]]{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}} spoken by the inhabitants of the [[Eastern Shaar]], from the [[Council Hills]] in the north to the [[Toadsquat Mountains]] in the south, and from [[Landrise]] in the west to [[Giant's Belt]] in the east.{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|26}}
